entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
